title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-4.5 - Mattresses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 80-4.5 - Mattresses

State Regulations

Effective May 31, 1973, any mattress shall be deemed
highly flammable and dangerous if it fails to meet the standard contained in

Appendix F-7 of this Part (Flammability Standard for Mattresses, DOC FF 4-72, issued by the U.S. Secretary of Commerce). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
80-4.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
